text: Tekh, kotoryye uverovali, Allakh utverzhdayet slovom istiny v etoy zhizni i v Den' voskreseniya, a nevernykh udalyayet ot nego, poskol'ku oni neprigodny dlya yego vospriyatiya. Allakh delayet, chto pozhelayet, ukreplyaya odnikh na puti istiny i svodya s nego drugikh. Nikto ne v sostoyanii protivostoyat' Yego vole ili Yego resheniyu
